Special Powers
DISEASE VECTOR: Poison. When Pestilence uses it, he deals penetrating damage. // Pestilence has SAFEGUARD: Poison.
THE FIRST CHILDREN: At the beginning of the game, if your starting force has two or more characters with the Horsemen keyword, this game Pestilence has: "Steal Energy, but with close or range attacks." // If a friendly character named Apocalypse, Annihilation, or Genesis is on your force, modify Pestilence's attack and defense +1.
